title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.15 - Tax exemption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.15 - Tax exemption

State Regulations

Upon receipt of the division certification as provided in
section
1750.14
of this Part, the housing
company shall thereupon notify the municipality in which the housing
development is located, by written document, of the impending dissolution of
the housing company and the attendant ineligibility for tax exemption under the

Private Housing Finance Law. A copy of such notification shall thereupon be
sent to the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1750.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
